children.label: School Name

children.name: address
children.label: Street Address

children.name: code_available
children.label: Do you have a school code issued by the Ministry of Education?

children.name: code
children.hint: Note: This should be the same code issued by the Ministry of Education and used in the census of schools.
children.label: School Code

choices.name: primary_js_ss
choices.label: Primary, junior secondary, and senior secondary schools

choices.name: js_ss
choices.label: Junior secondary and senior secondary schools

children.name: level_of_education
children.label: What level of education does this school offer?

children.name: nomadic
children.label: Is this a nomadic school?

children.name: boarding
children.label: Is this a boarding school?

children.name: education_type
children.label: What type of education does the school offer?

children.type: select all that apply or specify other
children.name: managed_by
children.label: Who runs/manages the school?

children.name: private_school_recognition
children.label: What is the status of school recognition?

children.name: school
children.label: School Information

children.name: all_weather_road_access
children.label: Can the road to the school be used all the time, even during the rainy season?

children.type: number of days in last month
children.name: days_inaccessible
children.label: How many days in the last month were people not able to reach the school because the main road/route could not be used?

children.name: attendance_when_inaccessible
children.label: Were most students able to come to school even when the main/regular route to the school was not accessible?

children.hint: Enter 0 if less than 1 km.
children.name: distance_to_catchment_area
children.label: How far is the school, in kilometers, from the areas it serves (catchment area)?

children.name: distance_to_secondary_school
children.hint: Enter 0 id within 1 km or 9999 if you are a secondary school.
children.label: What is the distance to the nearest secondary school in kilometers?

children.name: daily_public_transport
children.label: Is there daily public transport from this primary school to where nearest the secondary school is located?

children.hint: Please enter the number of students. If none, then enter 0.
children.name: num_students_beyond_3km
children.label: Please estimate the number of students who live further than 3 km from the school.

children.type: select all that apply or specify other
children.name: power_sources_available
children.label: What power sources are available at this school?

children.name: functional
children.label: Is the %(label)s connected and functional?

children.name: repair_time
children.label: The last time the %(label)s broke, how long did it take to fix it?

children.name: months_broken
children.hint: Enter 0 if less than one month
children.label: Please specify how long ago the %(label)s broke down (IN MONTHS)

children.name: power_sources
children.label: Power Sources

children.hint: Enter 0 if the school always had electricity/power.
children.type: number of days in last month
children.name: days_no_electricity
children.label: How many days in past month was the school with no electricity/power from any source?

children.type: select all that apply or specify other
children.name: water_sources_available
children.label: What IMPROVED water sources are on the premises or less than 100 meters away?

children.name: repair_time
children.label: The last time the %(label)s stopped working or broke how long did it take to repair?

children.name: water_sources
children.label: Water Sources

children.hint: Please enter 0 if water was always available
children.type: number of days in last month
children.name: days_no_water
children.label: How many days in the past month was the school without water from any of the sources you have indicated as available?

children.hint: Please enter 0 if potable water was always available
children.type: number of days in last month
children.name: days_no_potable_water
children.label: How many days in the past month was the school without POTABLE water from any of the sources you have indicated as available?

children.name: instructions_physical_structure
children.label: Note: Do not ask the next question aloud. Respond to the question based on your own observation of the school buildings.

children.name: physical_structure
children.label: How would you describe how a majority of the school buildings look?

children.name: nomadic_school_structure
children.label: Is the school a temporary structure for nomadic schools?

children.type: number of days in last month
children.name: times_building_cleaned
children.label: How many days in the last month were school buildings swept/cleaned?

children.type: number of days in last month
children.name: days_trash_disposed
children.label: How many days in the last month was rubbish or waste collected or burned or appropriately disposed?

children.name: infrastructure
children.label: Infrastructure

choices.name: mobile_phone
choices.label: At least one mobile phone owned by the school (not a private number owned by a staff member)

choices.name: mobile_signal
choices.label: Able to get mobile phone signal anywhere within the school buildings and the school compound

children.type: select all that apply or specify other
children.name: available_information_technology
children.label: Which of the following are available at this school?

children.name: functional
children.label: Is the %(label)s currently functional?

columns.name: mobile_phone
columns.label: At least one mobile phone owned by the school (not a private number owned by a staff member)

columns.name: mobile_signal
columns.label: Able to get mobile phone signal anywhere within the school buildings and the school compound

children.name: information_technology
children.label: Information Technology

children.name: total_teachers
children.label: What is the total number of teachers at the school?

children.name: num_male_ft
children.label: Number of Male Teachers (full time)

children.name: num_male_pt
children.label: Number of Male Teachers (part time)

children.name: num_female_ft
children.label: Number of Female Teachers (full time)

children.name: num_female_pt
children.label: Number of Female Teachers (part time)

children.name: instructions_teachers_qualification
children.label: I would like to learn about the qualifications of the teachers at the school. Please tell me the number of male and female teachers that have the following qualifications.

children.name: num_male
children.label: Male Teachers with %(label)s

children.name: num_female
children.label: Female Teachers with %(label)s

children.name: teachers_by_qualification
children.label: Number of teachers by qualification

children.name: instructions_nonteaching_staff
children.label: Please enter the total number as well as the male and female breakdown for the non-teaching staff.

children.name: num_male
children.label: %(label)s: Male

children.name: num_female
children.label: %(label)s: Female

children.name: num_total
children.label: %(label)s: Total

children.name: nonteaching_staff

columns.name: senior
columns.label: Senior staff (pay scale Grade 7 and above)

children.label: Number of non-teaching staff

children.name: teachers_quarters
children.label: Are there any teachers living quarters?

children.name: quarters_sufficient
children.label: Are there sufficient living quarters for teachers?

children.name: quarters_condition
children.label: How would you describe the physical status of the teachers living quarters?

children.type: number of days in last month
children.name: days_understaffed
children.label: What is the number of days in the last month that school was understaffed?

children.hint: The number of days the school was closed do to understaffing cannot be more than the number of days the school was understaffed.
children.type: number of days in last month
children.name: days_closed
children.label: What is the number of days in last month that school was closed due to lack of staff?

children.name: teachers_on_time
children.label: In your view, do teachers usually arrive to school on time?

children.hint: Please enter 0 if none were trained. Otherwise enter the number trained during THIS school year.
children.name: teacher_attendance_training
children.label: How many teachers have attended any training/workshop/seminar during this school year?

children.name: teachers_and_staff
children.label: Teachers, Staff and School Management Committees (SMCs)

children.hint: Please enter 0 of none attended. Otherwise enter the number who were there or select "not available" if the number is not available in school records.
children.name: teachers_attended_last_day
children.label: How many teachers attended school during the last time school was open for a regular school day?

children.name: school_capacity
children.label: How many students was the school built to hold (school capacity)?

children.name: school_extra_capacity
children.label: Do you have space to admit more children?

children.name: school_extra_capacity_yes
children.label: How many more children can the school admit?

children.name: two_shifts
children.label: Does the school operate in two shifts  (morning and afternoon/evening)?

children.name: multigrade_teaching
children.label: How many teachers teach more than one class at the same time?

children.name: num_male_students_enrolled
children.label: What is the total number of MALE students enrolled during the current school year?

children.name: num_female_students_enrolled
children.label: What is the total number of FEMALE students enrolled during the current school year?

children.hint: This must equal the sum of male and female students from the previous two questions.
children.name: num_students_enrolled
children.label: What is the total number of students enrolled during the current school year?

children.name: student_teacher_attendance
children.label: Student Enrollment and Attendance / Teacher Attendance

choices.name: materials
choices.label: Other education material (pencils, exercise books, etc.)

children.name: fees_paid_for_by_school

choices.name: materials
choices.label: Other education material (pencils, exercise books, etc.)

children.name: fees_charged_by_school
children.label: Which of the following expenses are charged by the school (parents / guardians are required to pay the school)?

choices.name: materials
choices.label: Other education material (pencils, exercise books, etc.)

children.name: other_school_expenses
children.label: Which of the following are not charged by the school, but parents / guardians are required to pay independently?

children.name: amount
children.hint: Enter 0 if the fee does not apply to this school
children.label: In the current academic year, how much does the school charge for %(label)s (in naira)?

children.name: exemptions_granted
children.label: Does the school grant exemptions from %(label)s?

columns.name: materials
columns.label: Other education material (pencils, exercise books, etc.)

children.name: num_students_exempt
children.label: How many students are exempt from fees?

children.hint: IN KIND fees can be providing services to the school, providing some basic school items or furniture etc., in exchange for not paying school fees.
children.name: in_kind_fees_charged
children.label: Does the school charge IN KIND fees?

children.name: in_kind_fees_types
children.label: What IN KIND fees does the school charge?

children.hint: If obtained write the school name, school code, LGA and ward on the booklist.
children.name: booklist
children.label: Can you obtain a copy of the booklist per class for this school year?

children.name: school_fees
children.label: School Fees

children.type: select all that apply or specify other
children.name: sources
children.label: What are the main sources of funds for the school?

children.name: sends_cash_directly_to_school
children.label: Does school receive cash directly from %(label)s?

children.name: budget_received_amount
children.label: How much funds does the school receive for one academic year (in naira)?

choices.name: outlay_mid_year
choices.label: Middle of the year (second and third quarter)

children.name: budgetary_outlay
children.label: When does the school usually receive funds from its funding sources?

children.type: select all that apply or specify other
children.name: budget_spending
children.label: Who decides how the budget money is spent?

children.hint: Please enter the number of teachers paid by this source.
children.name: num_teachers_paid
children.label: How many teachers are paid from %(label)s?

children.name: teachers_pay

columns.name: private_non_prof
columns.label: Private not for profit school funds

children.label: Teacher Pay

children.name: textbook_supply
children.label: Who supplies textbooks?

children.type: select all that apply or specify other
children.name: school_construction
children.label: Who pays for school construction?

children.name: student_scholarship
children.label: How many students in the school receive scholarships?

children.name: student_scholarship_amt
children.label: What is the scholarship amount for this school year?

children.hint: If never enter 0.
children.name: times_pay_delayed
children.label: How many times has teacher pay been delayed in the past year?

choices.name: volunteer_teachers
choices.label: Those who were not paid were volunteer teachers

choices.name: budget_delay_na
choices.label: Budget delay or budget was not available

children.type: select all that apply or specify other
children.name: reasons_pay_delayed
children.label: Why was teacher payment delayed?

children.hint: If never enter 0.
children.name: times_pay_missed
children.label: How many times has teacher pay been missed in the last year?

choices.name: volunteer_teachers
choices.label: Those who were not paid were volunteer teachers

choices.name: budget_delay_na
choices.label: Budget delay or budget was not available

children.type: select all that apply or specify other
children.name: reasons_not_paid
children.label: Why were teacher payments missed?

children.name: budget
children.label: Budget

children.name: meals_yes_no
children.label: Does the school provide meals?

choices.name: meals_not_at_school
choices.label: They do not have meals at school

choices.name: meals_outside
choices.label: Outside in a specific area within the school grounds

children.name: meals
children.label: Where do students normally have their meals (whether they bring it from home or the school provides it)?

children.name: library
children.label: Does the school have a functioning library?

children.name: library_materials
children.label: How many books, magazines and other reading materials does library have?

children.name: library_new_materials
children.label: How many times a year are new materials added to the library?

children.name: sports_facility
children.label: Does the school have an area to play sports or exercise?

children.name: covered_roof
children.label: Do ALL of the school buildings and classrooms have a covered roof?

choices.name: building_purpose_built
choices.label: Purpose-built especially to be a school

choices.name: building_converter_no_walls
choices.label: Converted building with rooms holding multiple classes (no walls between)

choices.name: building_converter_w_walls
choices.label: Converted building with one class per room (walls separate different classes)

choices.name: building_mixed
choices.label: Mixed-use building (school plus other commercial use)

children.name: school_building_type
children.label: What type of school building is this?

children.name: fence
children.label: Does the school have a boundary wall or fence?

children.name: health_clinic
children.label: Does the school have health services for students and staff?

children.name: instruction_classrooms
children.label: I will now ask you some questions about the classrooms. Please provide a response for each item.

children.name: classrooms_good_condition
children.label: Number of classroom in good condition

children.name: classrooms_minor_repairs
children.label: Number of classrooms in need of MINOR repairs

children.name: classrooms_major_repairs
children.label: Number of classrooms in need of MAJOR repairs

children.name: classrooms_unused
children.label: Number of unused classrooms

children.name: classrooms_multiple_use
children.label: Number of classrooms with multiple uses

children.name: classes_outside
children.label: Are any classes held outside because there are not enough classrooms?

children.hint: Examples are staff rooms, office, library room etc.
children.name: other_rooms
children.label: How many rooms other than classrooms are there in the school?

children.name: number
children.label: What are the total number of arms (sections) in the current school year (%(label)s)?

children.name: sections
children.label: Sections

children.name: num_bench
children.label: What is the total number of attached desks and benches in the school?

children.name: num_bench_unused
children.hint: Should be smaller than total number of attached desks and benches.
children.label: How many are not in use because they are in bad condition?

children.name: benches_unattach_yn
children.label: Do you have other benches and desks that are not attached and are for student use in classrooms?

children.name: num_bench_unattach
children.label: What is the total number of unattached benches in the school?

children.name: num_bench_unattach_unused
children.hint: Should be smaller than the total number of unattached benches in the school.
children.label: How many are not in use because they are in bad condition?

children.name: num_desks_unattach
children.label: What is the total number of unattached desks in the school?

children.name: num_desks_unattach_unused
children.hint: Should be smaller than the total number of unattached desks in the school
children.label: How many are not in use because they are in bad condition?

children.name: chalkboards
children.label: Does each classroom have a chalkboard / blackboard?

children.name: instruction_textbooks
children.label: I would like to ask you some questions about textbooks and other materials.

children.name: textbooks_english
children.label: Number of ENGLISH textbooks for every 10 students

children.name: textbooks_math
children.label: Number of MATH textbooks for every 10 students

children.name: textbooks_ss
children.label: Number of SOCIAL STUDIES textbooks for every 10 students

children.name: textbooks_science
children.label: Number of PRIMARY SCIENCE textbooks for every 10 students

children.name: num_exercise_book
children.label: Number of EXERCISE BOOKS for every 10 students

children.name: provide_pens
children.label: Does the school provide  PENS/PENCILS to the students?

choices.name: pens_enough
choices.label: Sufficient (every student has at least 1 pen-pencil)

choices.name: pens_moderately_insufficient
choices.label: Moderately insufficient (25% of students or fewer do not have a pen-pencil)

choices.name: pens_severely_insufficient
choices.label: Severely insufficient (more than 25% of students do not have a pen-pencil) .

children.name: pens_sufficient
children.label: How sufficient Is the number of PENS/PENCILS to meet student needs?

children.name: nat_curriculum
children.label: Does the school have a national curriculum for all subjects?

children.name: teacher_guide
children.label: Does each teacher have an official teachers guide or syllabus (from the Ministry of Education) for every subject?
